title: Login in is taking forever...

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body:
Yesterday it was fine. Now I don't know what is wrong with the client.

Tried to turn off and on my computer and router, but it's still in a loading loop.

I can access internet just fine but the launcher can't open the game.

Need help!

Edit: I played this morning on another pc, just fine. Went to this one, I get stuck on the loading client screen...

replies.body: Stuck on authenticating then never loads

I FIXED IT...KINDA: Edit: Comcast's area of access for many people in Illinois who use their service are having problems because something on Comcast's side (hence why u can't get in but others can....my suggestion for the time being till its fixed is to use a VPN service such as CyberGhost to move YOUR point of access to an area around the USA to a place where League is able to access at the time being) *WARNING* most VPN services will not work with Discord...sadly

Your network is probably running into some difficulties when trying to send your connection to our login servers since you keep getting stuck in that loop, but you could login on a different pc. Let's try adjusting some of your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to cover the basics, but if that doesn't help we might need to look into using a VPN to route your connection in a different way.
yea idk wtf is going on
Still can't log on, and I've been trying for hours. I've tried everything, nothing is working. I live in Chicago!
Anyone in Illinois area??? Indiana? Michigan? somewhere near the new server location in Chicago?
cause another post...most of the people having this problem or looking for it are in these areas
im indiana and cant log in

Just a little snippet from my LeagueClient log.

000176.071|  ERROR| SSL_ERROR_SYSCALL - The underlying BIO reported an I/O error. (5)
000176.071|  ERROR| ALE-4FBFEF56 - FAILED_TO_GET_LOGIN_DATA_PACKET - getLoginDataPacketForUser failed

Cant access mine either, but riot servers are "online" :(

Same here. Please see attached ping test to Riot NA server and to google.com. This is happening on all computers on my local network.
